text: On 6 September 2024, 26-year-old woman Aysenur Ezgi Eygi (born 27 July 1998), an American and Turkish dual citizen, was shot and killed, allegedly by the Israeli Defense Forces, during a protest against illegal Israeli settlements in Beita, Nablus, in the West Bank. == Related pages == * American citizens killed by the IDF: ** ** ** Rachel Corrie ** Shireen Abu Akleh * Hersh Goldberg-Polin (an American citizen abducted and killed by Al-Qassam) * Israeli occupation of the West Bank == References == Category:2024 deaths Category:Violence against women Category:Israelâ€“Palestine conflict
title: Killing of Aysenur Eygi
